description: This header file declares helper functions used for extracting resources from device and endpoint objects in a simplified object creation context within the Zilker SDK. It includes function declarations for obtaining string, boolean, and float resources, and references external device and endpoint structures.

methods.name: extractDeviceResource
methods.description: Extracts a resource string from a device object, returning a copy of the value or default if not available. Caller must free the returned string.

methods.name: extractEndpointResource
methods.description: Extracts a resource string from an endpoint object, returning a copy of the value or default if not available. Caller must free the returned string.

methods.name: extractEndpointResourceAsBool
methods.description: Extracts a boolean resource from an endpoint object, returning the value or default if not found.

methods.name: extractEndpointResourceAsFloat
methods.description: Extracts a float resource from an endpoint object, returning the value or default if not found.
